en_text: I didn't know what he thought about us.
jp_text: 私たちのこと  どう思っていたのかはわからないけど
google_translated: I do not know what I thought about us

en_text: There was a park in the middle of the empty desert.
jp_text: 公園があったの

en_text: In the midst of a desert full of nothingness all the way to the horizon...
jp_text: 地平線までなんにも無い砂漠の真ん中にね
google_translated: Nothing to the horizon in the middle of the desert

en_text: ...it was the only place\N built with concrete and asphalt.
jp_text: {\fscx90}そこだけコンクリートとアスファルトに舗装された場所があって
google_translated: There is a place paved to concrete and asphalt there

en_text: and assorted other playground equipment.\NThe paint still hadn't dried yet.
jp_text: まだ  ペンキも乾いてなかった
google_translated: I have not dried the pain yet

en_text: Of course, there wasn't a sign of children anywhere.
jp_text: もちろん子供の姿なんか一つもなかった
google_translated: Of course there was no one of the children

en_text: Even while we were alive, we weren't allowed to meet with or talk to anyone else.
jp_text: 生きてるうちだって誰とも会っちゃいけなくて
google_translated: Even if you live, you have to meet anyone

en_text: If we died, we'd be treated as if\N we'd never existed in the first place.
jp_text: 死んだら最初から居なかったことにされちゃうんだって
google_translated: If you died, it will be done that you did not have it from the beginning

en_text: Helicopters came and took us back to the base,
jp_text: ヘリが来て基地に連れ戻されて
google_translated: A helicopter comes back to the base

en_text: but none of us were yelled at.
jp_text: でも  誰からも叱られなかった
google_translated: But no one was scolded by

en_text: My story ends here.
jp_text: 私の話はこれでおしまい

en_text: Sorry. You went to the trouble of inviting me out,\N but I've been nothing but  trouble.
jp_text: ごめん  せっかく誘ってくれたのに

en_text: Why... are you saying this now?
jp_text: 何言ってんだ？

en_text: Thank you.
jp_text: サンキュ

en_text: A crowd of uniforms streamed into the twilight...
jp_text: {\an1\fad(200,200)\be1}制服の群れに

en_text: The sunflower we found last year was...
jp_text: {\an1\fad(200,200)\be1}去年　見つけた　ひまわりは

en_text: ...facing the sky more proudly than ever before.
jp_text: {\an1\fad(200,200)\be1}空を見上げてた

en_text: "Don't give up, don't wither away!"
jp_text: {\an1\fad(200,200)\be1}折れないように　枯れないように
google_translated: Do not foretles so as not to break

en_text: If you put that meaning in your tears...
jp_text: {\an1\fad(200,200)\be1}涙に出来たなら
google_translated: If you were able to tear

en_text: ...then maybe something will change tomorrow.
jp_text: {\an1\fad(200,200)\be1}明日は何かが変わるかな
google_translated: I wonder if something will change tomorrow

en_text: I wish I could be like that sunflower...
jp_text: {\an1\fad(200,200)\be1}あの　ひまわりみたいに

en_text: ...and stand up straight and tall.
jp_text: {\an1\fad(200,200)\be1}まっすぐ　背を伸ばして

en_text: Even if I'm trembling today... it's all right.
jp_text: {\an1\fad(200,200)\be1}今日は揺れていたって、いいよ
google_translated: It is good that it was shaking today
